channel.title: Comments on: SELLOUT: Stephin Merritt allows Volvo to drive away with his integrity

item.title: By: Stuart
item.dc:creator: Stuart
item.description:
And what are all of you doing to fight the capitalist consumer complex?
Love the sausage--don't want to know how it's made.
item.content:encoded:
And what are all of you doing to fight the capitalist consumer complex?

Love the sausage–don’t want to know how it’s made.

item.title: By: Oliver Chesler
item.dc:creator: Oliver Chesler
item.description: I recently wrote and article you may like about The Magnetic Fields and Stephin Merritt: http://www.wiretotheear.com/2007/10/20/the-magnetic-fields-and-stephin-merritt/
item.content:encoded: I recently wrote and article you may like about The Magnetic Fields and Stephin Merritt: http://www.wiretotheear.com/2007/10/20/the-magnetic-fields-and-stephin-merritt/

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
Rex, sir, you're missing the point. A crappy band can't technically "Sell Out" by scoring a Car commercial. In fact that crappy band might get a ride all the way to the bank.
Only a band or in this case a musician with an impressive oeuvre and history of artistic integrity can truly Sell Out.
And who uses the label "haters" in a discussion about indiepop icons? We're talking about Stephin "motherfucking" Merritt, not Tupac.
item.content:encoded:
Rex, sir, you’re missing the point. A crappy band can’t technically “Sell Out” by scoring a Car commercial. In fact that crappy band might get a ride all the way to the bank.

Only a band or in this case a musician with an impressive oeuvre and history of artistic integrity can truly Sell Out.

And who uses the label “haters” in a discussion about indiepop icons? We’re talking about Stephin “motherfucking” Merritt, not Tupac.

item.title: By: rex
item.dc:creator: rex
item.description: Y'know, it's such an easy thing to be a hater and accuse someone of being a sellout when you haven't a clue what it's like to be in their shoes. There is no doubt that most of you haters would be peeing all over yourself if your crappy band was asked to be in a car commercial.
item.content:encoded: Y’know, it’s such an easy thing to be a hater and accuse someone of being a sellout when you haven’t a clue what it’s like to be in their shoes. There is no doubt that most of you haters would be peeing all over yourself if your crappy band was asked to be in a car commercial.

item.title: By: tivoli
item.dc:creator: tivoli
item.description: I always thought the Go-Betweens managed to pull it off without sucking.
item.content:encoded: I always thought the Go-Betweens managed to pull it off without sucking.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: true, true. but isn't hanging yourself - no matter your situation - grounds for a wag of the finger? yeah, life's tough. and most of the time it's a real bitch. but both he and cobain had kids and families. i'm not one to try and delve into another man's heart (or anus) and try to divine some sort of reason for why he killed himself. it was by far the best career move either party could have ever made - no doubt. the headlines virtually write themselves: "Torn Apart By Love, Singer Watches Herzog and Strangles Himself" or "The Guy Who Wrote 'I Hate Myself and I Want To Die' Finally Blew His Brains Out." suicide - while it makes all kinds of existential sense i suppose - is at least grounds for some sort of disapproval. shit, if it didn't, i would've done it long ago prolly. but then again, you kill yourself, you gay.
item.content:encoded: true, true. but isn’t hanging yourself – no matter your situation – grounds for a wag of the finger? yeah, life’s tough. and most of the time it’s a real bitch. but both he and cobain had kids and families. i’m not one to try and delve into another man’s heart (or anus) and try to divine some sort of reason for why he killed himself. it was by far the best career move either party could have ever made – no doubt. the headlines virtually write themselves: “Torn Apart By Love, Singer Watches Herzog and Strangles Himself” or “The Guy Who Wrote ‘I Hate Myself and I Want To Die’ Finally Blew His Brains Out.” suicide – while it makes all kinds of existential sense i suppose – is at least grounds for some sort of disapproval. shit, if it didn’t, i would’ve done it long ago prolly. but then again, you kill yourself, you gay.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: true, true. unless they pull an ian curtis and die before they start to suck.
item.content:encoded: true, true. unless they pull an ian curtis and die before they start to suck.
